nodes.body: g.yul zlog, dmag bzlog. Ex: Sgrol ma g.yul bzlog gi cho ga (W2228), Kla klo’i dmag bzlog (W15511), Dmag bzlog nyer lnga (Directed at Mongols, text not extant) (W8781).
